data.title: Home Franchise Concepts
data.meta_description:
Leaders Who Care 
We’ve collected some of the brightest, most experienced minds in the franchising industry who are dedicated to helping franchisees own and run successful businesses.  Meet those who are responsible for taking Home Franchise Concepts from a single brand in 1992 to one of the world’s
data.text:
We’ve collected some of the brightest, most experienced minds in the franchising industry who are dedicated to helping franchisees own and run successful businesses. Meet those who are responsible for taking Home Franchise Concepts from a single brand in 1992 to one of the world’s largest home services franchises with 2,600 franchised territories in North America.

Andy’s background includes extensive franchise experience having led enterprises across several consumer-facing industries in both the U.S. and abroad. He recently served as President of Krispy Kreme North America and previously held executive leadership roles at Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen, Churchill Downs Incorporated and PepsiCo. He earned an MBA from the University of Rhode Island and a BS from the U.S. Naval Academy. His primary focus at Home Franchise Concepts is to provide the strategic direction and corresponding support that will enable the success of our brands and franchisees.

Jennie has been with Home Franchise Concepts since 2004. She is a legal professional with over 30 years experience both as an in-house attorney and in franchisor operations.

Amir comes to us with deep experience in high-growth, multi-site retail environments and an MBA from the University of Texas, McCombs School of Business, and Bachelor’s and Master’s Degrees in Accounting from the University of Texas at Arlington. As CFO, he leads all aspects of the company’s financial functions including accounting, financial reporting, short and long-range planning and budgeting, and treasury.

Heather joined the Home Franchise Concepts family in early 2021. She has over 20 years of experience building strategic brand platforms with integrated marketing campaigns, at companies like Mattel, Taco Bell, Nissan, and Allergan.

Heather joined Home Franchise Concepts in October 2019 as Chief Marketing Officer. In 2021 she became President of The Tailored Closet and PremierGarage, successfully leading the growth and development of both brands. In June 2023, Heather was appointed President of Budget Blinds to apply her impactful leadership skills and experience to continue in furthering the brand. Prior to Home Franchise Concepts, Heather held key leadership roles at organizations such as Tillys, Irvine Company, and Mattel.

Heidi joined Kitchen Tune-Up in May of 2003 and became its president in 2017. As a 2nd generation franchise owner, Heidi strives to keep Kitchen Tune-Up and Bath Tune-Up profitable and leaders in the industry.

Steve joined Home Franchise Concepts in late 2021 and has been involved in the cleaning and restoration industry for over 30 years. Prior to joining us, he led several other organizations both in franchising and corporate operations.

Paul has been with Home Franchise Concepts since 2020. He serves as president for both Two Maids and Aussie Pet Mobile. Paul has extensive experience in both Finance and Accounting, having served as a CFO and Controller at previous organizations.

Greg joined Home Franchise Concepts in 2024. He serves as president for Concrete Craft, The Tailored Closet, and PremierGarage brands. Greg has a wealth of experience, having served as the Chief Operating Officer of Sapporo USA Inc. His impressive career in marketing includes senior positions with several outstanding brands such as Kraft, Novartis, and Sleeman Breweries LTD. Prior to his public sector career, Greg served as an officer in the United States Marine Corps.
